turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, can you order some coffee drinks from Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want you to order from Starbucks at Rose Plaza in Aurora.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. What do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order four grande cappuccino with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me check.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Take your time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry, they said that 2% milk is not available today. Do you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, please use nonfat milk then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Just a second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Take your time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, they confirmed your order of four grande cappuccino with nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Please pay from my account with Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Your drinks are on order at Starbucks at Rose Plaza in Aurora and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything that I can help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you very much. Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Goodbye!
